Articles.Content:
I know,I know, this bird is old, and must've been posted a TON of times, but I just wanted to get my version out there. The moment I saw C7's new parts in action, it was all I dreamt of making. The photos I provided are a little out of date. I have added flaps and canards to the aft end of the Blackbird. It can fly pretty well once off the ground, but I warn you, don't play with the roll too much, or you're going to have to put up a fight. She can be a bit touchy at times, and you'll have to restabilize her roll ever so slightly now and then, but I managed to hit a service ceiling of approximately 15,400m (50,524 ft.) at a speed of about 520 m/s (1,872 km/h), which is Mach 1.53 supercruise.

Thank you C7 for your amazing contribution to this wonderful game.
I forgot to add, you need to disable the forward-facing engines. I added those for thrust-reversal landing situations. =P
It should ditch the forward engines dor the blue lighted air intakes

eeek! First one i've seen, and I've been working on one, but couldnt get it flyable! Well done!!

SR-71 is the best.
